016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao;
017
018import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
019import androidx.room.Dao;
020import androidx.room.Delete;
021import androidx.room.Insert;
022import androidx.room.Query;
023import androidx.room.Update;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
025import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
026import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
027import java.util.Collection;
028import java.util.List;
029
030/**
031 * Provides CRUD operations on {@link User} entity instances. {@code INSERT}, {@code UPDATE}, and
032 * {@code DELETE} operations are implemented as ReactiveX {@link Single} tasks, which execute on
033 * subscription; some {@code SELECT} tasks are implemented using {@link LiveData} queries, which
034 * execute on observation, or (if already being observed) on Room-based updates to the underlying
035 * tables; one {@code SELECT} ({@link #select(String)}) is implemented as a ReactiveX {@link Maybe}
036 * task, to allow for the appropriate handling of an empty query result.
037 */
038@SuppressWarnings("unused")
039@Dao
040public interface UserDao {
041
042  /**
043   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
044   * {@code user} into the database and invokes the subscribing
045   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the auto-generated primary key value of
046   * the inserted record.
047   *
048   * @param user {@link User} instance to be inserted.
049   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code user} into the database.
050   */
051  @Insert
052  Single<Long> insert(User user);
053
054  /**
055   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
056   * {@code users} into the database and invokes the subscribing
057   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with a corresponding list of auto-generated
058   * primary key values of the inserted records.
059   *
060   * @param users {@link User} instances to be inserted.
061   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code users} into the database.
062   */
063  @Insert
064  Single<List<Long>> insert(User... users);
065
066  /**
067   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), inserts
068   * {@code users} into the database and invokes the subscribing
069   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with a corresponding list of auto-generated
070   * primary key values of the inserted records.
071   *
072   * @param users {@link User} instances to be inserted.
073   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) insert {@code users} into the database.
074   */
075  @Insert
076  Single<List<Long>> insert(Collection<User> users);
077
078  /**
079   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
080   * {@code user} in the database and invokes the subscribing
081   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
082   *
083   * @param user {@link User} instance to be updated.
084   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) update {@code user} in the database.
085   */
086  @Update
087  Single<Integer> update(User user);
088
089  /**
090   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
091   * {@code users} in the database and invokes the subscribing
092   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
093   *
094   * @param users {@link User} instances to be updated.
095   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) update {@code users} in the database.
096   */
097  @Update
098  Single<Integer> update(User... users);
099
100  /**
101   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), updates
102   * {@code users} in the database and invokes the subscribing
103   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
104   *
105   * @param users {@link User} instances to be updated.
106   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) update {@code users} in the database.
107   */
108  @Update
109  Single<Integer> update(Collection<User> users);
110
111  /**
112   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), deletes
113   * {@code user} from the database and invokes the subscribing
114   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
115   *
116   * @param user {@link User} instance to be deleted.
117   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) delete {@code user} from the database.
118   */
119  @Delete
120  Single<Integer> delete(User user);
121
122  /**
123   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), deletes
124   * {@code users} from the database and invokes the subscribing
125   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
126   *
127   * @param users {@link User} instances to be deleted.
128   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) delete {@code users} in the database.
129   */
130  @Delete
131  Single<Integer> delete(User... users);
132
133  /**
134   * Constructs and returns a {@link Single} that, when executed (subscribed to), deletes
135   * {@code users} from the database and invokes the subscribing
136   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer} with the number of records modified.
137   *
138   * @param users {@link User} instances to be deleted.
139   * @return {@link Single} that will (when subscribed to) delete {@code users} in the database.
140   */
141  @Delete
142  Single<Integer> delete(Collection<User> users);
143
144  /**
145   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of a single user, using the primary key
146   * value. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code user} table are modified using Room
147   * methods), the query is executed.
148   *
149   * @param id Unique identifier (primary key value) of the {@link User} instance of interest.
150   * @return {@link LiveData} that can be observed for the {@link User} instance of interest.
151   */
152  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = :id")
153  LiveData<User> select(long id);
154
155  /**
156   * Constructs and returns a ReactiveX-based query of a single user, using the fixed OAuth2.0
157   * identifier (subject) of the {@link User} of interest. When executed (subscribed to), the query
158   * is executed, and the result (if any) is passed to the subscribing
159   * {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer}; if the query does not return a result, then
160   * the subscribing {@link io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Action}.
161   *
162   * @param oauthKey OAuth2.0 identifier (subject) of the {@link User} instance of interest.
163   * @return {@link Maybe} that can be executed (subscribed to) to obtain the {@link User} instance
164   * of interest.
165   */
166  @Query("SELECT * FROM user WHERE oauth_key = :oauthKey")
167  Maybe<User> select(String oauthKey);
168
169  /**
170   * Constructs and returns a {@link LiveData}-based query of all {@link User} instances, sorted by
171   * display name. When observed (or when the contents of the {@code user} table are modified using
172   * Room methods), the query is executed.
173   */
174  @Query("SELECT * FROM user ORDER BY display_name ASC")
175  LiveData<List<User>> select();
176
177}
